# ByteConverter.FromBoolean method

Writes boolean (a one-byte value where zero is `false`, non-zero is `true`) to a buffer.

```csharp
public void FromBoolean(bool value, Span<byte> buffer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The boolean value to write to the buffer. |
| buffer | The buffer to write the value to. |
